message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it.  I'm offering it to you for $175.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your time. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to get a bit more for this product. How about $160?  I'm willing to work with you to make this happen.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to suggest a price of $155 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
